sentences.cn: 或者油漆厂或者什么不卫生的东西?

sentences.en: It is unhygienic not to wash your hands before eating.
Parts of the shop were very dirty, unhygienic, and an ideal breeding ground for bacteria.
sentences.cn: 店里的一些地方十分肮脏不洁，简直就是滋生细菌的理想温床。

sentences.en: Pathetic dogs kept in small unhygienic cages.
sentences.cn: 可怜的狗被关在很脏的小笼子里.

sentences.en: Such an unhygienic girl ! Crawling with bugs ! Of course nobody wants to sleep next to her.
sentences.cn: 不讲卫生,身上生着虫类,什么人还不想躲开她呢? ”

sentences.en: Unhygienic conditions give rise to disease.
sentences.cn: 卫生条件不好会导致疾病.
吃不干净的食品会带来疾病.

sentences.en: Unhygienic hands are a way of transmitting infection.
sentences.cn: 不干净的双手是传播病原体的感染途径之一.

trans.tran_en: dirty and likely to make people ill
